definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: The Negro minstrel is touring the country.
sentences.chinese: 那个黑人歌舞团正在全国各地巡回演出。

sentences.english: He started his professional career as a singer in the Singing and Dancing Troupe of Xuzhou City, Jiangsu Province.
sentences.chinese: 毕业后于江苏省徐州市歌舞团开始专业生涯。

sentences.english: Ziegfeld's great triumph, the Follies , came soon after.
sentences.chinese: 齐格飞的大胜利，他很快就接着推出歌舞团表演。

sentences.english: The performance of Broadway Show is highly creditable.
sentences.chinese: 百老汇歌舞团的表演是非常值得赞许的。

sentences.english: On her wedding day, the daughter hired an all-female singing and dancing group to perform.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼当天，裁缝师的女儿请了一个女歌舞团到场表演。

sentences.english: Sanyi music and dance troupes visit the hotel every evening to provide entertainment for the visitors.
sentences.chinese: 三彝歌舞团每天晚上来宾馆为参观者提供娱乐服务。

definition: abbr. for 藝術學校|艺术学校/art school
PLA military personnel who specialize in literary or artistic pursuits
to act (in a play)/to perform/to put on (a performance)/performance/concert/show/CL:場|场[chang3],次[ci4]
to be a dancing partner to sb/to perform as a backup dancer/taxi dancer (hired dancing partner)/escort
